alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 6:07PM EDT until June 14 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 645 PM EDT/545 PM CDT/. * At 607 PM EDT/507 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles north of Blountstown to 11 miles south of Greensboro to 6 miles southwest of Tallahassee Comm College, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodville, Blountstown, Crawfordville, St. Marks, Orange, Wakulla, Bristol, Altha, Sopchoppy, Rock Bluff, Jewel Fire Tower, Shadeville, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Selman, Abe Springs, Wakulla Springs, Vilas, Central City and Chipola. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
